natural-progression.stone.warning: §4You cannot break hard blocks without a pickaxe.§r

itemGroup.natural-progression.name: Natural Progression
natural-progression.pebble.jei.info: Hold pebbles in each hand (main and off-hand) and right click (while not looking at a block) to try knapping to create §nflint§r. This process has a random chance of working so be patient!
